desc.Start: Insert {{text}} at the start of the filename
desc.End: Insert {{text}} at the end of the filename
desc.PositionFromEnd: Insert {{text}} at the specified position from the end {{position}}

All.caseSensitiveAndRegex: Replace all {{from}} with {{to}} (Case Sensitive, Regular Expression)

First.caseSensitiveAndRegex: Replace first {{from}} with {{to}} (Case Sensitive, Regular Expression)

Last.caseSensitiveAndRegex: Replace last {{from}} with {{to}} (Case Sensitive, Regular Expression)

Both.Alphanumeric: Remove leading and trailing alphanumeric characters
Both.NonAlphanumeric: Remove leading and trailing non-alphanumeric characters
Both.Uppercase: Remove leading and trailing uppercase letters
Both.Lowercase: Remove leading and trailing lowercase letters
Both.Whitespace: Remove leading and trailing whitespace characters
Both.Punctuation: Remove leading and trailing punctuation characters
Both.CustomCharacters: Remove leading and trailing custom characters: {{customCharacters}}

desc.Prefix: Start: {{start}}, Step: {{step}}, Repeat: {{repeat}}, Padding: {{padding}}, Reset Every: {{resetEvery}}, Separator: {{separator}}, As Prefix
desc.Suffix: Start: {{start}}, Step: {{step}}, Repeat: {{repeat}}, Padding: {{padding}}, Reset Every: {{resetEvery}}, Separator: {{separator}}, As Suffix
desc.Position: Start: {{start}}, Step: {{step}}, Repeat: {{repeat}}, Padding: {{padding}}, Reset Every: {{resetEvery}}, Separator: {{separator}}, At Position {{position}}
desc.Whole: Start: {{start}}, Step: {{step}}, Repeat: {{repeat}}, Padding: {{padding}}, Reset Every: {{resetEvery}}, Separator: {{separator}}, As Filename

First.left: Left pad the 1st number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
First.right: Right pad the 1st number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Second.left: Left pad the 2nd number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Second.right: Right pad the 2nd number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Third.left: Left pad the 3rd number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Third.right: Right pad the 3rd number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Fourth.left: Left pad the 4th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Fourth.right: Right pad the 4th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Fifth.left: Left pad the 5th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Fifth.right: Right pad the 5th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Sixth.left: Left pad the 6th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Sixth.right: Right pad the 6th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Seventh.left: Left pad the 7th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Seventh.right: Right pad the 7th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Eighth.left: Left pad the 8th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Eighth.right: Right pad the 8th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Ninth.left: Left pad the 9th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Ninth.right: Right pad the 9th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Tenth.left: Left pad the 10th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Tenth.right: Right pad the 10th number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

Last.left: Left pad the last number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
Last.right: Right pad the last number with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

All.left: Left pad all numbers with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}
All.right: Right pad all numbers with '{{paddingChar}}' to a length of {{length}}

desc.Start: Insert {{creator}} at the start of the filename
desc.End: Insert {{creator}} at the end of the filename
